long_description: When you want waterproof rain protection with urban appeal, the Marmot Traveler Jacket fills the bill. Designer lines and a detachable hood keep you styling in the big city. Marmot MemBrain(R) polyester oxford fabric is waterproof, windproof and breathable. 100% seam taped to seal out weather. Water-resistant zippers on hand pockets and single chest pocket. Internal zippered media pocket and internal welt pocket stow your essentials. Marmot Traveler Jacket features adjustable snap cuffs and a drawcord hem that keep warmth in, weather out.
short_description: When you want waterproof rain protection with urban appeal, the Marmot Traveler Jacket fills the bill. Designer lines and a detachable hood keep you styling in the big city.
